Name: Painter's Pets
About the game: Coat the fields with paint and splatter your friends to claim victory in this sidescrolling arena competition! In Painter's Pets your goal is to cover as much of the field as you can by traveling across tiles or spitting paint onto them. With free RGB color selection and 4 team icons to pick from you and your friends can create mayhem and art at the same time! This tchotchke game is a perfect breaktime distraction with games lasting around a minute with simple rules and satisfying movement.
